articles.author: Jerry Brewer
articles.title: Column | The American-born NBA superstar is disappearing. Enter Cooper Flagg. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Can the NBA’s No. 1 overall pick from Newport, Maine offset the dearth of younger American players capable of dominating the league?
articles.content: On the eve of the NBA draft, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander paraded through the streets of Oklahoma City, shirtless and with a Canadian flag wrapped around his waist. Joy finally infiltrated his cool and qu… [+6461 chars]
